Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
Deprecated Methods
twitter4j.http.RequestToken.getAccessToken()
          Use Twitter.getAccessToken() 
twitter4j.http.RequestToken.getAccessToken(String)
          Use Twitter.getAccessToken() 
twitter4j.TwitterOAuthSupportBase.getOAuthAccessToken(String, String, String)
          Use getOAuthAccessToken(RequestToken requestToken, String oauthVerifier) 
twitter4j.User.getStatusCreatedAt()
          use getStatus().getCreatedAt() 
twitter4j.User.getStatusId()
          use getStatus().getId() 
twitter4j.User.getStatusInReplyToScreenName()
          use getStatus().getInReplyToScreenName() 
twitter4j.User.getStatusInReplyToStatusId()
          use getStatus().getInReplyToStatusId() 
twitter4j.User.getStatusInReplyToUserId()
          use getStatus().getInReplyToUserId() 
twitter4j.User.getStatusSource()
          use getStatus().getSource() 
twitter4j.User.getStatusText()
          use getStatus().getText() 
twitter4j.User.isStatusFavorited()
          use getStatus().isFavorited() 
twitter4j.User.isStatusTruncated()
          use getStatus().isTruncated() 
twitter4j.TwitterOAuthSupportBase.setOAuthAccessToken(AccessToken)
          Use TwitterFactory.getInstance(AccessToken accessToken) 
twitter4j.TwitterOAuthSupportBase.setOAuthAccessToken(String, String)
          Use Twitter getInstance(AccessToken accessToken) 
twitter4j.Twitter.setOAuthAccessToken(String, String)
          Use Twitter getInstance(AccessToken accessToken) 
twitter4j.TwitterOAuthSupportBase.setOAuthConsumer(String, String)
          Use TwitterFactory.getInstance(String consumerKey, String consumerSecret) 
 

Deprecated Constructors
twitter4j.AsyncTwitter(String, String, TwitterListener)
          use new AsyncTwitterFactory.getBasicAuthorizedInstance() instead. 
twitter4j.Twitter()
          use TwitterFactory.getInstance() instead 
twitter4j.Twitter(String, String)
          use TwitterFactory.getBasicAuthenticatedInstance(screenName, password) instead 
twitter4j.TwitterStream()
          use new TwitterStreamFactory.getInstance() instead. 
twitter4j.TwitterStream(String, String)
          use new TwitterStreamFactory.getInstance() instead. 
twitter4j.TwitterStream(String, String, StatusListener)
          use new TwitterStreamFactory.getInstance() instead.
